00046 #define MAXEPOLLSIZES 10000
00047 using namespace std;
00048 
00049 typedef void (*Service)(int);
00050 class Server {
00051         int sock;
00052         struct sockaddr_storage their_addr;
00053         void servicing(Service);
00054 public:
00055         Server(string,bool,int,Service,bool);
00056         Server(string port,int waiting,Service serv);
00057         virtual ~Server();
00058         int Accept();
00059         int Send(int,string);
00060         int Send(int,vector<char>);
00061         int Send(int,vector<unsigned char>);
00062         int Send(int,char*);
00063         int Send(int,unsigned char*);
00064         int Receive(int,string&,int);
00065         int Receive(int,vector<char>&,int);
00066         int Receive(int,vector<unsigned char>&,int);
00067         int Receive(int,char *data,int);
00068         int Receive(int,unsigned char *data,int);
00069         int Receive(int,vector<string>&,int);
00070 };
00071 
00072 #endif /* SERVER_H_ */
